text: Well, I get my subject on Wednesday night I think it out carefully on Thursday, and make my rough sketch on Friday morning I begin, and stick to it all day, with my nose well down on the block.
author: John Tenniel

text: This enraged the other Nazi so much that the next morning he came to our house and he shot my father.
author: Bruno Schulz

text: Early One Morning takes time and, I mean, all things like that I felt were very important.
author: Anthony Caro

text: If I don't fish in the morning, I fish in the evening.
author: Dion Sanders

text: Suddenly a single shot on the extreme left rang out on the clear morning air, followed quickly by several others, and the whole line pushed rapidly forward through the brush.
author: John Gibbon
